channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: With a new home for DOGE in the White House, here's what you need to know
item.description: The Department of Government Efficiency, a post-election promise brought to life by President Trump via executive order looks different than its origi...

item.title: 1,500 dolphins captured on stunning video off California coast
item.description: A miles-long cluster of dolphins was filmed leaping and gliding across Carmel Bay, forming an unusual "super pod" of more than 1,500 of the marine cre...

item.title: Two ways Trump aims to reshape government. And, how U.S. children are doing in school
item.description: President Trump's actions this week reveal his broad effort to reshape the federal government. And, the new Nation's Report Card shows the pandemic's ...

item.title: A $4B settlement for Hawaii wildfire victims is in legal limbo as an unusual trial starts
Eggs prices are likely to shoot up even more in 2025. Here's why.
item.description: The humble egg is now a source of frustration for millions of shoppers around the U.S, who face soaring prices and shortages. What's going on?

item.title: Zuma's daughter to appear in court over South Africa riots, reports say
item.description: Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla is accused of inciting violence in 2021 following the jailing of her father.

item.title: Ukrainian drone strike hits second Russian oil refinery in a week
item.description: The wave of drone strikes is Ukraine's second large-scale attack on Russia this week.

item.title: Customs worker exposed by daughter's social media admits taking bribes
item.description: Omar Ambuila's daughter posted photos of herself carrying designer handbags, taking luxury vacations to Paris and driving a $330,000 Lamborghini.

item.title: 'It's absolute chaos': At the scene of Kumbh Mela crush
item.description: Vikas Pandey and Samira Hussain explain how the chaos unfolded in northern India.

item.title: Trump signs an order restricting gender-affirming care for minors
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order seeking to end gender-affirming medical treatments for children and teenagers under the age of 19.

item.title: RFK Jr. says he'll fix the overdose crisis. Critics say his plan is risky
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. survived heroin addiction and says that if confirmed as head of the Department of Health and Human Services, he'll build treatme...

item.title: The evidence that shows Rwanda is backing rebels in DR Congo
item.description: Where are rebels causing havoc in eastern DR Congo getting their funding?

item.title: Flawed emergency alert systems lagged when residents needed them most during Los Angeles wildfires
RFK Jr.'s confirmation hearing set for today
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faces the Senate Finance Committee today in the first of two confirmation hearings.

item.title: 66 million years ago, a fish chewed up and spit out food. It's now a fossil in Denmark
item.description: The fossil was found at a cliff in Denmark. Fossilized vomit is called regurgitalite, and it's a type of trace fossil, which tells scientists about an...

item.title: In pictures: Welcoming the Lunar New Year
item.description: Fireworks, music, lanterns, and dragon dancing filled streets across Asia to celebrate the Year of the Snake.

item.title: Ukraine investigates video of possible POW executions by Russian troops
item.description: Ukraine's government says a video circulated on social media appears to show 6 soldiers detained by Russian forces, who "subsequently shot them dead."
